Main.slogan: Ideas and inspiration for those who devote themselves to opera.

JoinUs.title: I want to join the community OperaClass.net
JoinUs.subtitle: The goal of our project is to help young talented opera singers find their way to the stage.
JoinUs.for-students-description: We will publish training materials and conduct masterclasses. Leave information about yourself so that you don't miss anything.
JoinUs.for-teachers-description: If you are a specialist and have something to share with young opera singers, please contact us. Stage movement, makeup art, acting skills, music theory and history - all of these are interesting.
JoinUs.for-media-description: If you can help promote events in the media, write to us.
JoinUs.support-us-description: Currently, the project is completely volunteer. We need support, then we will be able to conduct masterclasses and publish more exclusive information.
